feed.title: Bow Valley (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Bow Valley (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:41 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bow Valley 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -22.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -26.9°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending overnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 24. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
